description.en:
All of the scary games and bloody NFTs are accessed with $UNDEAD, the native token of UNDEAD FINANCE.

Warning: Holding $UNDEAD is not for the faint of heart, it may be hazardous to your health and in extreme cases death by scare may occur. Those with hands of diamond, who survive our haunted games will of course be rewarded. If that’s too much for you, you can also buy ghosts, spirits, or curse NFTS from our Deadly marketplace.

Beyond The Grave
Buy, sell, trade, and mint NFT’s on our marketplace using $UNDEAD token

Exclusive artist collections only found on Undead Finance

Unique rewards for collecting undead assets

Death Match
Gain access to 1st P2E games on FANTOM using the dead pass which can only be purchased with the $UNDEAD token

Play to earn $UNDEAD tokens to add to your horde

Adventures are always more fun with friends, invite them and play together!

Dead Pool
Raise the dead: Turn your undead token into NFTs by staking them in the dead pool

Summon your army: recruit zombies, witches, & vampires by combining NFT’s

Earn a ""killing"" minting rare and ultra-rare NFTS
